applications.title: Wings.cheap
applications.description: Wings.cheap is a web app which allows you to quickly find wing deals in your area. Built from the ground up to be responsive, fast, and beautiful. Under the hood I'm using AngularJS, Express, and MongoDB.

applications.title: Tv Tracker
applications.description: TvTracker is an application for tracking your TV Shows. Built to work great on mobile, desktop, and even from your status bar (Mac). Under the hood we're using React, MobX, Service Workers, and Electron.

applications.title: BetterDo.
applications.description:
Depreciated: As of October 15th, 2017, this application is no longer available. It had a good run, but server changes have made it difficult to manage. Thanks for your support!

This is the first web app I built. While I was studying for college and used it for keeping track of homework. It also has sharing functionality so you can share lists with others. Under the hood I'm using jQuery, PHP, and CSS3.
